about_the_game:
This is a small and relaxing game in which you have to find objects made with pixels, within levels made with those same objects! Each level is unique, adorable and procedural, allowing you to play your favorite levels infinitely.



Explore each of the beautiful levels, looking for all kinds of objects related to the theme. Each level you complete unlocks new challenges and items to find, as well as a daily challenge full of unique variety.

Can you find all the objects and get the 3 stars in each level?



Characteristics
  • Colorful and varied theme design
  • Thematic levels
  • Dynamic difficulty
  • Zoom, Track and rechargeable lives
  • Fast levels, perfect for short games
  • Beautiful objects in 1 bit Pixelart
  • Perfect for practicing vocabulary
  • Daily Challenge with hundreds of designs and objects to find

name: Baimason's Thing Finder Puzzle Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10, Windows 11, 64 bit only
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @2.3 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 9.0c compliant
